pic1_alt: Are Canadian NHL Players More Likely to be Born Early in the Year? Comparing the distribution of birth months between Canadian NHL players and Canada in general. More NHL players are born in January and February (but also May and July) than are Canadians in general, particularly in February (11.8% of NHL players vs 7.5% of Canadians). Likewise, fewer NHL players are born in August, September, October, November, and December than are Canadians in general, particularly in September (4.8% of NHL players vs 8.7% of Canadians).
